amendment.description: To permit the Secretary of Health and Human Services to waive the prohibition on the use of amounts by Indian tribes and tribal organizations for construction or renovation of facilities for child care programs if the use will result in an increase of the level of child care services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2834 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2834 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Tester.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2834 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Tester.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2834 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
